thoughts: Wishes they could atone for their mistakes
Curses c_n for driving them out
Heard a rumor of hostile rogues in the area
Scoffs at the thought they deserve this
Curls up in a den and listens to the rain
Is missing the company of c_n
Is telling some rogues about c_n
Is watching some kittypets and scoffing
Doesn't believe that this is a fair punishment
Wonders if anyone will care when they die
Wonders if they will actually go to any kind of afterlife
Imagines that they might be wandering the world forever
